name: HELPERS OF THE HANDICAPPED KOLHAPUR

address: Helpers of the Handicapped Kolhapur 223 / 6 E, Atmaram Apartments Tarabai Park

briefDescription: Comprehensive Rehabilitation of persons with disabilities with the aim of making them educated, productive and self-supportive citizens leading fuller lives with dignity.Providing residential facilities for imparting quality Inclusive Education, healthcare service  and  Vocational Training for rural students and trainees with disabilities
